sections.title: Fire Hazards
sections.description: Identify potential fire hazards including ignition sources and combustible materials

items.question: Are fixed electrical installations periodically inspected and tested every five years?
items.helpText: Check for valid electrical installation condition report (EICR)
items.notes: Last inspection completed June 2024, certificate on file

items.question: Are electrical equipment and appliances periodically inspected and tested?
Is the use of trailing leads and adaptors avoided where possible?
Are adequate measures in place to stop people from smoking on the premises?
items.notes: No smoking policy enforced, designated external area provided

items.question: Are the premises adequately secured to prevent unauthorised access?
items.notes: 24/7 security, access control system in place

sections.title: People at Risk
sections.description: Identify who might be at risk in case of fire

items.question: Have you identified the maximum number of people likely to be on the premises?
Are there any young, disabled, or lone workers present in the premises?
items.notes: 3 employees with mobility requirements, personal evacuation plans in place

sections.title: Evaluate and Act
sections.description: Assess risks and determine necessary fire safety measures

items.question: Do you have enough escape routes?
Is a fire alarm system needed?
items.notes: L2 system installed and maintained quarterly

items.question: Do all your staff know the emergency plan?
items.notes: Quarterly fire drills conducted, records maintained

items.question: Has the risk assessment been reviewed in the last 12 months?
